fj

Class Semigroup<A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fj.Semigroup<A>

  • public final class Semigroup<A>
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementations must satisfy the law of associativity:
    • Associativity; forall x. forall y. forall z. sum(sum(x, y), z) == sum(x, sum(y, z))
